New Records: Mattia Zaccagni scored a goal reminiscent of Alessandro Del Piero's famous World Cup goal
Luka Modric became the oldest goalscorer in Euro 2024 history
Key Match Events: Mattia Zaccagni scored a late winner in stoppage time
Croatia dominated the game but failed to convert chances
Emotional reactions from players and coaches after the match
Post-Match Reflections: Zlatko Dalic expressed disappointment and frustration
Players and coach spoke about resilience and the importance of the win
Miscellaneous Highlights: Italy had come from behind twice in the tournament
Croatia outperformed Italy in expected goals and shots on target
Others: The match was marked by emotional moments, including fans throwing beers and Luka Modric's potential retirement
